suite.name: ComputersDatabase

test.name: First Name Should be ACE

kw.name: Begin Web Test
Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Set Variable If
kw.doc: Sets variable based on the given condition.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: Browser driver log file created to: C:\Robot_Learning\ComputersDatabase\Results\firefox\nul

Problem reading geckodriver versions: error sending request for url (https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SeleniumHQ/selenium/trunk/common/geckodriver/geckodriver-support.json): error trying to connect: dns error: Host desconocido. (os error 11001). Using latest geckodriver version

There was an error managing geckodriver (error sending request for url (https://github.com/mozilla/geckodriver/releases/latest): error trying to connect: dns error: Host desconocido. (os error 11001)); using driver found in the cache

Cannot capture screenshot because no browser is open.
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

Prepara el navegador recibido por argumento para los tests. Concretamente, se comprueba la validez del argumento, se preparan las opciones pertinentes, se abre el navegador a la URL, se comprueba el titulo y se maximiza la ventana

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.

test.doc: Cargar la página y verificar que el primer valor del campo _Computer name_ de la lista es ACE
test.status: Setup failed: Execution terminated by signal

test.name: Next Page Has Specific First Row Values
test.doc: Cargar la página, darle a Next, para ir a la página 2 y verificar que el primer valor del campo _Computer Name_ de la lista es ASCI White, _Introduced_=01/01/2001, _Discontinued_=01/01/2006 y _Company_=IBM
test.status: Test execution stopped due to a fatal error.

test.name: Filter By Name "ASCI" Should Show 6 Results
test.doc: Cargar la página, introducir ASCI en el campo de filtro y darle al botón _Filter by Name_. Verificar que el resultado obtenido es 6
test.status: Test execution stopped due to a fatal error.

test.name: Create New Computer With Empty Data Should Fail
test.doc: Cargar la página y darle al botón _Add a new computer_. Darle al botón _Create this computer_. Verificar que sale un mensaje de error _Failed to refine type : Predicate isEmpty() did not fail_
test.status: Test execution stopped due to a fatal error.

test.name: Create New Computer With Valid Data Should Work
test.doc: Cargar la página y darle al botón _Add a new computer_. Completar valores del formulario (nombre, introduced, discontinued, company). Darle al botón _Create this computer_. Verificar que sale un mensaje de EXITO _Done ! Computer xxxxx has been created_
test.status: Test execution stopped due to a fatal error.

suite.doc: Ejercicios de automatización de frontal con Robot Framework - Para probar todos los navegadores, ejecutar ``run-tests.bat``
